WorkItem.ClosedComment:
There is no alternative known. For 2007 and 2010, Word only looks under program files.
This is not a BibWord issue.
WorkItem.Description:
Am I right in thinking that it is impossible to install this for Word 2010 if you are not an administrator on the machine?

It doesn't seem to work if I put the styles in my own appdata folder as per the Word 2013 instructions and not having admin rights on my machine I can't write to anything under C:\Program Files
